channel.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
channel.description:
[quote="lovelongtime"]Hiya,
I am the one to pwn impsoft.net, impsoft are full of sluts who only rip other peoplez code, they think they leet and they got skillz. But we all know they lil noobs. Stop selling illegal code u money whores or u will be destroyed. U will take no actions, u will find nothing in ur logs, u have no fucking idea of what we have in store for u.
To Ruler Erick, u code ripping lamerz, die. Stop sellin teh ripped code an go leanr some java. We well destroy u.
To GenoDemoN, ^ + gain some originality lamer, u r copying teh copier. Go to homosexual hell u fagget.
To pplsuqbawlz, suck my large penis u loser, u brin nothin to the comunety and u will be taken downz.
To all other impsoft.net fanboyz, u can be lame all u want, none will be spared.
P.S here are teh files found at impsoft, tehre are 200+ scripts, Slave377, etc all for a price of $0.0 Rubles. Enjoy, let the lamerz be lamerz, the lamer-exterminators are here. link removed at request of genodemon, dont repost
This is our declaration of war. Die, faggets.
-Haxed911[/quote]
Recently posted here: http://google.com/smf/index.php?topic=69.0 (Site was attacked by...[i]someone[/i], I wonder who?

item.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“philodespotos, post:73, topic:2591”][quote author=BlackThursday link=topic=2834.msg30937#msg30937 date=1147729182]
2) Their IMPsoft_rm() script is still pimpin after like 2 years.
[/quote]
Alright, seriously. 2 years?

They say time moves more quickly as you get older. But I’m not that bloody old yet.

Aryan has barely been around half a year.

Basic accuracy, people. Make an effort.[/quote]
hard to believe so much time has passed, seems like just yesterday I was doing walk() 30 tiles away. lol remember the kiddies complaing about broken scripts, god i wish someone had a record of that.

Read full topic

item.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“BlackThursday, post:69, topic:2591”]Believe what is in your heart… thats what I always say… LOL… fuck that. Believe who you want to believe Ima lay down some solid facts here:

  1. IMPsoft got hacked… no… PWNED
  2. Their IMPsoft_rm() script is still pimpin after like 2 years.
  3. Their free aryan release is ok but Nerice makes a better one, and few people like to pay for SlaveBot.

Thats pretty much it… add to the list… DONT FLAME LIKE A FAG… ONLY SHIT YOU CAN PROVE.[/quote]

No, IMP’s Aryan > Nerice’s because theirs works with their controller, which is REALLY handy.

Read full topic

item.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

Believe what is in your heart… thats what I always say… LOL… fuck that. Believe who you want to believe Ima lay down some solid facts here:

  1. IMPsoft got hacked… no… PWNED
  2. Their IMPsoft_rm() script has been pimpin for a while.
  3. Their free aryan release is ok but Nerice makes a better one, and few people like to pay for SlaveBot.

Thats pretty much it… add to the list… DONT FLAME LIKE A FAG… ONLY SHIT YOU CAN PROVE.

Edit: I stand corrected… their scripts aren’t as old as i remember… np changed it.

Read full topic

item.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

Damn, i dunno what to believe.
A lot of people say the Impulse scripts are ripped, but i never saw a other script what looked liked 1 of the impsoft scripts…
I’ll be behind impsoft unless people show me evidence that geno and eric are rippers.
Peace

Read full topic

item.title: IMPsoft hacker comes forward!
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:50, topic:2591”][quote author=GenoDemoN link=topic=2834.msg27346#msg27346 date=1147286628]

hellothere and sdouble you have added yourselves to the shit list of who i got to speack with mopar about.

How so? Because I pointed out that you can’t punish people on this forum for speaking their mind? I simply assumed that you meant instinct has an account on impsoft and you were going to remove it. Maybe I misunderstood the threat to him?

Please clarify, you have confused me.

Thank you.

yea sdouble, geno wanted me to warn and/or ban you

ROFL, like thats ever gonna happen

mopar you are miss quoting me. anyways i misinterepted one of sdobules’s posts thats why iw as mad with him i didnt ask for him to be banned at all read you log.
[/quote]

Are you trying to cover your shit up again?[/quote]

i never cover up anything, i even told mopar to CECK HIS AIM LOGS to prove it.

Read full topic
